name: Demande d'application de la procédure d'urgence: Mesures spécifiques et temporaires concernant la validité de certains certificats et licences - C9-0126/2020 -
title: Specific and temporary measures in view of COVID-19 outbreak and concerning the validity of certain certificates, licences and authorisations and the postponement of certain periodic checks and training in certain areas of transport legislation
